channel.title: Changelog on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Changelog on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: 2021 July Updates
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re closing July with some notable highlights. Let’s go through them ✌️ 🚨 *Note: Covid situation is getting worse. Stay safe. 🦠 *The pandemic is going stronger than ever. There has been over 100k internal cases over the country til now. Take good care of you and your beloved ones. We hope everyone can stay safe. Finish the shipment for our WFH station We’ve finished the shipment for all the WFH gears.
